## What's Fixed

This release focuses on correctness improvements to match llama.cpp's tokenization output exactly. Various edge cases in encoding and decoding have been addressed.

## Validated
- All Tier 1 models now produce identical output to `llama-tokenize`
- 13 comprehensive parity tests passing

## Installation

```toml
[dependencies]
shimmytok = "0.6"
```
